mapper.select: select * from item_t order by item_no
mapper.update: update item_t set item_name=#{item_name}, img = #{img} , price = #{price}, volume = #{volume} , item_content = #{item_content} where item_no = #{item_no}
mapper.select: select to_char(order_date,'mm') as month, sum(payment_price) as payment_price_sum from order_t where to_char(order_date,'yyyymm') between '201601' and '201612' group by to_char(order_date, 'mm') order by to_char(order_date,'mm') asc
select * from order_t where to_char(order_date,'mm') = #{month} order by to_char(order_date,'mm') asc
select * from order_t order by order_no desc
mapper.update: update order_t set del_bool = 'Y' where order_no = #{order_no}
mapper.select: select * from order_t where ${category} like '%${content}%' order by order_no desc
select * from order_t where del_bool = 'N' order by order_no desc
select * from order_t where cancel_bool = 'Y' order by order_no desc
select * from member_t order by id
select count(*) from order_t where order_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 0.99999421
